div.head: 肉乾麩起
div.div: the flesh is desiccated and bran emerges

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the flesh is desiccated and bran emerges

sense.def: Illness Sign of a rising of desiccated skin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry ren xue 人血 quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 : 皮肉乾 枯，身上麩片起 , “The skin and flesh are desiccated and wither. Bran flakes emerge from the body”, writes: 肉乾麩起 , “ The flesh is desiccated and bran emerges ”.
